mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 10, 2022:
- Mode of transportation from Greer to Buffalo: Self-driving (duration: 11 hours 19 mins, distance: 1,200 km, cost: 60)
- Accommodation in Buffalo: Sunny Spacious South Slope Studio (Entire home/apt, No parties & No smoking, $337 for 2 nights, review rate of 4.0, suitable for 3 guests)

Day 2 - March 11, 2022:
- Explore Buffalo: Visit attractions such as Niagara Square, Buffalo City Hall, and the Buffalo Zoo
- Dining in Buffalo: Recommended restaurants include The Black Sheep, Tappo Restaurant, and Bacchus Wine Bar & Merchant

Day 3 - March 12, 2022:
- Mode of transportation from Buffalo to Niagara Falls: Self-driving (duration: 26 mins, distance: 31.9 km, cost: 1)
- Accommodation in Niagara Falls: Sunny Bedroom In The Heart of Bushwick (Private room, No pets & No parties, $893 for 2 nights, review rate of 3.5, suitable for 2 guests)

Day 4 - March 13, 2022:
- Explore Niagara Falls: Visit attractions such as the Niagara Falls State Park, Maid of the Mist, and Cave of the Winds
- Dining in Niagara Falls: Recommended restaurants include The Red Coach Inn, Top of the Falls Restaurant, and Wine on Third

Day 5 - March 14, 2022:
- Mode of transportation from Niagara Falls to Greer: Self-driving (duration: 11 hours 41 mins, distance: 1,228 km, cost: 61)

Total estimated cost: $1,378 for accommodations and transportation. The remaining budget of approximately $2,022 can be used for dining, activities, and other personal expenses during the trip.
